tool_description: The API provides endpoints to generate challenges, validate signature and certificate chains (PKI).
name: EU-LOTL Certificate Validation
title: EU-LOTL Certificate Validation

api_list.name: Service Status
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://trust1team-eu-lotl-certificate-validation-v1.p.rapidapi.com/system/status"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "trust1team-eu-lotl-certificate-validation-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://trust1team-eu-lotl-certificate-validation-v1.p.rapidapi.com/system/status"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "trust1team-eu-lotl-certificate-validation-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Generate Challenge
api_list.description: This endpoint generates a new challenge. The digest algorithm can be: 'MD5', 'SHA1', 'SHA256' or 'SHA512'

optional_parameters.name: digest
optional_parameters.description: The digest algorithm can be: 'MD5', 'SHA1', 'SHA256' or 'SHA512'
